name: Escape!
description: Escape is a third person, nail biting,  puzzle platform game. As a cybernetic grey alien you have to try and escape various levels while avoiding deadly obstacles, in order to get out of the virtual prison you are being held in. Set inside a futuristic landscape you will have to navigate your way through each level by avoiding death traps, spiked floors and using moving platforms and switches to make your escape. Warning* you will die often*.
